body.name: 4K Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, FHD Native 1080P VACASSO Portable Outdoor Movie Projector with Touch Screen, Compatible with iOS/Android/HDMI/TV Stick (Grey)
features: [Electric Focus and Touch Screen Buttons] The A45 home entertainment projector will stand out due to its unique, brilliant touch panel and RGB light design. With the implementation of electronic focus, this smart projector has also modernized and enhanced conventional manual focus. The supplied remote or touchscreen can be used for focusing and enables faster, more convenient operation.

[Auto Vertical Correction and 4P/6D Keystone] The movie projector's vertical alignment can be automatically corrected by ±30° by using the auto trapezoid setting. The A45 portable projector's enhanced 4P and 6D keystone correction allows users to manually change the picture's vertical or horizontal direction as well as its four corners. Also, for the finest experience whenever and wherever, the A45 video projector can also lower image size by up to 50%.

[Supports 4K, 500 ANSI and 20000:1 Contrast Ratio] Picture quality is important! Based on 20000L 500 ANSI and the better 20,000:1 contrast ratio, the A45 wifi bluetooth projector offers magnificent, detailed native 1080P images. It also supports 4K video. For increased fidelity and superior color accuracy, the 8-bit color depth maximizes color details. The A45 4K projector gives you the best game and movie look and feel by fully restoring the original image.

[5G & 2.4G WiFi and Upgrade Bluetooth 5.2] The 5G & 2.4G dual wifi-equipped A45 phone projector can connect to a smartphone or tablet without the use of a converter cable. Note: please connect the wifi projector and the TV Stick in order to watch Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu. This Bluetooth projector allows you to connect your Bluetooth speakers at any time and will provide you with a superb audio-visual experience. It is equipped with the recent Bluetooth 5.2 chip and 12W HiFi stereo speake

[Sealed Optical Engine and Presentation Via USB] A45 outdoor projectors have updated sealed optical engines, which avoid dust pollution on the optical components as opposed to regular projectors. AV, USB, HDMI, and audio connectors are included, making it simple to connect a PC, TV Stick, or switch. Additionally, it is ideal for presentations, slide sharing, and small gatherings. VACASSO ensures lifelong support and 24-hour assistance. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

VACASSO Home Theater Projector Works with TV Stick

How to set the Auto Keystone Correction？ Select the projector setting on the menu - Click the keystone correction - Turn on auto trapezoid. Can this projector play Netflix videos? You can connect the projector to Amazon TV stick to play Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu. These are not included in our package. Or you can connect the projector via HDMI cable. Any problem, please contact the after-sales team. How to connect to my iPhone？ 1，Connect the projector to the WiFi your Phone connected. 2，Turn on your iPhone’s screen mirroring. 3，Select the device VACASSO-5933 How to connect to my Android Phone？ 1，Connect the projector to the WiFi your Phone connected. 2，Turn on your Android Phone’s cast screen. 3，Select the device VACASSO-5933. Does this projector support connection to any smartphone? Some mobile devices may not support screen mirroring due to compatibility. (Such as Google Pixel phone and Motorola)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This projector replaced an older $1000.00+ Optima HD we had for over 10 years. The picture is twice the quality (excellent even at 90"), the connectivity is easy and reliable, the bulb is LED and much cooler with a longer life rating, it has quite a loud speaker (although it appears to be mono) as well as alternate connections for audio, and the fan runs about the same noise level as our former projector. We have it ceiling mounted at 12 feet from the screen and the adjustment more than compensates for any 4-corner keystone corrections needed to fill the screen (90" diagonal) at that distance (I had to reduce the picture size considerably). The downfalls are...There is at least a 1 second lag in sound if using the Bluetooth feature (although this seems standard across the industry). The software is a little quirky, but that hopefully will get better if they do an update. There is no auto-focus, but the remote focus works very well. The auto-keystone doesn't really work, but it's fine using the remote (it is automatic) and I only had to do it once. I will give it 5 stars as the picture is high quality and the features and function of this projector are well above what I would expect for a less than $200.00 unit. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We just bought a projector (Xgody Sail 1) that was twice the cost, but this one has a better picture. The only thing I wish is that it had more than one hdmi port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Projector for the price...
reviews.reviewText: I cant believe how far projector technology has gotten over the past 10 years or so. 10 years ago you had to spend almost 10 times this amount to get the same resolution and brightness.This projector rocks. Great picture quality, and sets up in minutes. I did calibrate the picture using the basic tools in the setup menu. I also changed the color temperature to cool, which brings out more of the blue tint in the image. Take a look at the pictures of this projo set up in a dark, and overhead lighted environment. In this test I was using a Tivo Stream 4k box and playing content both 1080p and 4k. Take a look at some pros and a few cons...PROS:easy set up. just hook it up to power and adjust focus.excellent picture quality at night (or light controlled room)very good picture quality with overhead light, and window open.off angle viewing looks great, and you don't lose any brightness. (see photo)sports with fast action looks smooth, no stutter or blurring.sound gets loud, but a little tinny.remote is easy to use - switches inputs fast.CONS:remote feels cheapremote needs 2 batteries (not included)the tripod included was pretty small.no carrying caseOverall, a very solid purchase. At this price, you cant go wrong. Will be great for those summertime late night movie nights on the patio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pero quería saber si alguien sabe cómo conseguir un respuesta de control para el proyector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Projector...loved it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I absolutely loved this projector, I bought it as a gift for my husband's birthday. He is happy to see it. This projector exceeded my expectations at this price, I am very happy to see the picture quality of this projector. It has become our favorite to watch movie show and spend good time with my family.This is very compact and light weight projector, the connectivity with the mobile phone is easy, also can connect with the laptop, we also connected our bose speaker to have a theater feel at home. It comes with the USB port easy to install. It has manual adjustment buttons on projector as well as a remote is given, you can adjust the size of image you want.The images are bright and clear. Overall a good purchase at this price I highly recommend. GOOD PURCHASE FOR FAMILY MOVIE TIME...loved it..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Specs are great, projector is not
reviews.reviewText: I bought an expensive pull down, pvc faced, black backed projection screen as I wanted to spend the summer watching movies outside. Advice on that..don’t bother with cloth ones they are horrendous. I only mentioned that because people don’t realize the quality of the screen is just as important as the projector itself. Now on to the projector..the specs were amazing, aesthetically it was beautiful and modern looking but the quality of the picture was absolutely terrible and most importantly the complete lack of setting to adjust the picture was non existent. So if you don’t like the picture you see when you turn it on, don’t expect to be able to adjust it (contrast ratio, brightness, colors, etc). I was in disbelief that a projector with such great specs, lumens and reviews ended up being so limited in functions and such a poor quality pic. Thats the exact reason I purchased such an expensive screen, so that I never needed to question the screen regarding the quality of the projector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Image quality ok, dust filter gives dead pixel effect
reviews.reviewText: I’ll start off by saying for 150 bucks you have to know what you should expect. This is not a professional projector so you shouldn’t expect it to look as good as a tv. What it does give you though is a cheap alternative to 1000+ dollar screen. Picture quality is ok. I’d lean on the side of underwhelming. Keystone adjustment is limited. Focus is adjusted manually and is difficult with the projector further back. The biggest fault to this projector has to be the dust filtration. It just doesn’t do a good enough job. As dust collects the particles get on the bulb and creates what looks like dead pixels. My fix to this was to take a used dryer sheet, fold it into three layers, and tape it to the air intake on the back of the projector. So far it has helped and I will update this if that changes. For 150 bucks it’s aight. I would give 4 stars but I had to modify it to keep it from ruining its own picture quality. Also the projector menu is lacking. Remote does not include batteries, they are aaa
